mapper.select: select * from z_asset where userid = #{userId} and assetpath =#{resPath}
mapper.update: update z_asset set isfinished = 0 where userId = #{userId} and assetPath = #{resPath}
mapper.select:
select resId,rescode,title,unifytype,time,imgpath,filesuffix,isfinished from ( select a.id as resId,a.resourceid as rescode,a.name as title,a.createTime as time,p.id as unifyTypeId ,p.MType as unifyType,a.AssetPath as imgPath ,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(AssetPath),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(AssetPath))-1)) as fileSuffix ,a.isfinished from z_asset a LEFT JOIN x_resourcetype p on p.id = a.unifyTypeId where a.userid = #{userId} and a.flag =false and a.FileType = 'A'
)temp_result where 1 =1
and EXISTS ( select id from x_resourcetype where (id = #{unifyTypeId} or pid = #{unifyTypeId}>0 )and flag =false and id = temp_result.unifyTypeId )
and EXISTS (select FormatCode from j_filetypedetail where flag = false and FileFormat =#{fileFormat} and FormatCode = CONCAT('.',temp_result.filesuffix))
ORDER BY time desc
mapper.update: update z_asset set name =#{name},UpdateTime=now() where id = #{id};
mapper.select:
select resId,rescode,title,unifytype,time,imgpath,filesuffix,size,updatetime,tfcode,tf_title from ( select a.id as resId,a.resourceid as rescode,a.name as title,a.updatetime,a.createTime as time,p.id as unifyTypeId,a.assetSize as size ,p.MType as unifyType,a.AssetPath as imgPath ,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(AssetPath),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(AssetPath))-1)) as fileSuffix ,c.tfcode,c.name as tf_title from z_asset a LEFT JOIN x_resourcetype p on p.id = a.unifyTypeId LEFT JOIN z_asset_syscourse s on s.assetid = a.id LEFT JOIN j_syscourse c on c.tfcode = s.tfcode where a.iscourseware = true and a.flag =false and a.FileType = 'A' and s.flag = false and a.userid = #{userId}
and a.name like #{title}
and EXISTS ( select c1.tfcode from j_syscourse_user su LEFT JOIN j_syscourse c1 on c1.id = su.syscourseid where su.flag =false and su.userid =#{userId} and c1.flag = false and locate(c1.tfcode,c.tfcode)>0 ) )temp_result where 1 =1
ORDER BY title desc, updatetime desc,size desc
ORDER BY updatetime desc,title desc, size desc
ORDER BY size desc ,updatetime desc,title desc
ORDER BY title desc, updatetime desc,size desc
select t.tfcode from z_asset_syscourse t LEFT JOIN j_syscourse sys on sys.tfcode = t.tfcode where t.assetid = #{resId} and t.flag = false ORDER BY LOCATE(#{curTfcode},t.tfcode) desc

select a.id ,a.name as title,a.keyword,AssetDesc as des ,AssetSize as fsize ,p.MType,p.id as typeId ,0 as DLoadTimes,0 as ClickTimes,1 as fromflag, a.name as fname, a.assetpath as fpath ,0 as userNum,0 as totalScore,0 as avgScore,REVERSE(LEFT(REVERSE(AssetPath),LOCATE('.',REVERSE(AssetPath))-1)) as FileExt,IsWjb as isDWJ,1 as isLocal from z_asset a LEFT JOIN x_resourcetype p on p.id = a.unifytypeid where a.id = #{resId} and a.flag =false and a.FileType = 'A'

select p.id,p.code,p.mtype from x_resourcetype p where p.flag = false and p.code in ( select left(p.code,4) from x_resourcetype p where p.id in ( select a.unifyTypeId from j_prepare_content c RIGHT JOIN j_lession_prepare l on c.preId = l.id LEFT JOIN z_asset a on a.id = c.contId where 1=1 and l.flag = false and l.userid = #{userId} and c.flag =false and c.conttype in (1,9) and a.flag =false and a.filetype = 'A' union ALL select r.mtype from j_prepare_content c RIGHT JOIN j_lession_prepare l on c.preId = l.id LEFT JOIN z_resource r on r.id = c.contId where 1=1 and l.flag = false and l.userid = #{userId} and c.flag =false and c.conttype in (2,10) and r.flag= false union ALL select d.mtype from j_prepare_content c RIGHT JOIN j_lession_prepare l on c.preId = l.id LEFT JOIN z_districts_resource d on d.id = c.contId where 1=1 and l.flag = false and l.userid = #{userId} and c.flag =false and c.conttype in (11,12) and d.flag= false ) )

select p.id,p.code,p.mtype from x_resourcetype p where p.flag = false and p.code in ( SELECT mtypecode from (select DISTINCT (SELECT left(p.code,4) from x_resourcetype p where p.id =a.unifytypeid) as mtypecode from z_asset a where a.flag =false and a.filetype = 'A' and a.userid =#{userId} and unifytypeid >0 )t where t.mtypecode = p.code )

select p.id,p.code,p.mtype from x_resourcetype p where p.flag = false and p.code in ( select left(p.code,4) from x_resourcetype p where p.id in ( select a.unifyTypeId from j_userlog g LEFT JOIN z_asset a on a.id = g.objId where g.flag = false and g.userid = #{userId} and g.opertypecode = 'view' and g.logtypecode = 'asset' and a.flag = false
union all
select z.mtype from j_userlog g LEFT JOIN z_resource z on z.id = g.objId where g.flag = false and g.userid = #{userId} and g.opertypecode = 'view' and g.logtypecode = 'resource' and z.flag = false
union all
select r.mtype from j_userlog g LEFT JOIN z_districts_resource r on r.id = g.objId where g.flag = false and g.userid = #{userId} and g.opertypecode = 'view' and g.logtypecode in ('districtres','schoolres') and r.flag = false ) )
mapper.update: update z_asset_syscourse set flag = 1 where assetid = #{resId} and tfcode = #{tfcode}
mapper.select: select a.id,a.name as title,a.assetdesc,a.assetpath,a.assetsize, a.keyword as keyword,sys.sharescope,sys.tfcode from z_asset a LEFT JOIN z_asset_syscourse sys on sys.assetid = a.id where a.id = #{id} ORDER BY a.id desc,sys.id asc LIMIT 1
